description:
"Your Sales Pages (Written, Video or Both) Are Your Online Sales People"

And like sales people, sales pages can either flop, sell a few, be average, good or truly outstanding.

You can have all the other marketing strategies on the planet, but if your sales pages are not selling, you aren't going to make it.

If you want to skyrocket your online sales, build your important list or attract an avalanche of new clients then you must have sales page that are going to perform.

One Billion .com's and Counting...

With so many people trying to sell online a good sales page is not going to cut through the clutter. You need an outstanding page, written, video or both.

This course is built on 12 proven steps that have generated millions in cash sales. Now you can create the same winning content for your sales pages.

On this course you will learn:

  • How and why you must seize attention in a world full of distraction (I blow the lid on the myth about 'Shrinking Attention Spans' in your prospects)
  • How to create killer headlines that instantly grab attention
  • How to identify the pain, problem or frustration of your prospects (They will think you have been snooping through their private messages)
  • How to whip up a buying frenzy in your prospects before they even see your offer
  • How to eliminate fear from any prospect so they will happily buy with you-more of the time
  • How to generate a storm of urgency that compels prospects to whip out their plastic
  • How to use the Law of Scarcity in your sales pages (This dramatically skyrockets results)
  • And so much more.

PLUS

  • Contains REAL LIFE case studies and examples of content I have created that generated 274K in one day, over 5 million in 12 months and multi-millions over 6 years.
  • The psychology behind the 12 steps and how these steps sell on an unconscious level
  • This is just under 4 hours of PROVEN content making strategies that powerfully persuade your prospects unconscious buying process to buy now
  • With a 10 page workbook stuffed with 64 powerful questions, you will be able to create a persuasive sales page within hours of completing the course.

By the end of this course you will be able to write your very own powerful sales pages or script your own unique video sales letters.
title: How to Write a Sales Page That Sells
